# Monkey Ranch Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a responsive web project for "Monkey Ranch" - a fictional adventure destination website. It includes HTML structure, CSS styling, and JavaScript interactivity.

## Technology Stack
- HTML5 for semantic markup
- CSS3 for styling and responsive design
- Vanilla JavaScript for interactivity
- No build tools or frameworks required

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main HTML file with structure for all sections
- `styles.css` - Complete styling with responsive design
- `script.js` - JavaScript for smooth scrolling and form handling

## Development Instructions
1. Open `index.html` in a web browser to view the website
2. Modify content in `index.html` for structure changes
3. Update `styles.css` for design/styling changes
4. Edit `script.js` for interactive functionality changes

## Features Implemented
- Responsive navigation bar with sticky positioning
- Hero section with call-to-action button
- About section with project description
- Services grid with hover effects
- Contact form with validation
- Footer with copyright information
- Smooth scroll animations
- Mobile-responsive design

## How to Run
Simply open `index.html` in any modern web browser. No server or build process required.

## Future Enhancements
- Backend integration for contact form submissions
- Image gallery section
- Testimonials section
- Booking system integration
